metadata.title: CVE-2018-17458 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An improper update of the WebAssembly dispatch table in WebAssembly inGoogle Chrome prior to 69.0.3497.92 allowed a remote attacker to executearbitrary code inside a sandbox via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
